description: Import uploads into a repository (resource: PUT /katello/api/repositories/:id/import_uploads)
name: repositories.import_uploads

async.description: Do not wait for the ImportUpload action to finish. Default: false

connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

publish_repository.description: Whether or not to regenerate the repository on disk. Default: true

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

sync_capsule.description: Whether or not to sync an external capsule after upload. Default: true

upload_ids.description: Array of upload ids to import

uploads.description:
"description: Array of uploads to import
 parameters:
     checksum:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: ''
     id:
       required: true
       type: string
       description: ''
     name:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Needs to only be set for file repositories
     size:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: ''
     "

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).
